Uses of Class
jpacman.model.Player

Packages that use Player
Package
Description
jpacman.model
This package contains the pacman model: i.e., it contains representations for cells, monsters, the player, the board, the game, etc.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    Engine.getPlayer()
    Return the player of the game.
    Player
    Game.getPlayer()
    Return the current player, which can be null if the game has not yet been initialized.

    Return the player initiating this move.
